Text: Hey guys, please comment if the e-book is satisfactory or if there is something broken or wrong.
Hey, good upload. Thanks a lot.
All the pictures came out all right except that many of them are sideways.

> All the pictures came out all right except that many of them are sideways. 

As the pictures have many information and small letters, I preferred to put it sideways to give the most possible space for a kindle device.

Thanks for the feedback.
I thought you probably had a reason for the pics being that way. Good job and thanks again.
